_header: Deem as you will and judge as you list
_description: Complaint to his mistress, a less defiant version of 1109, possibly also by W. Coullicke — one couplet

CamFitzMc182.Transcription:
Deme as yow wyll and Iwge as yow lysteYour Iwgmentes is vntrewe and
                    your deming is amis
CamFitzMc182.Note: Added by a hand of sixteenth century, written twice.
